attributes.review:
literally the second i opened this app, the fbi tracked me down cause my name wasn’t white sounding enough. 
they slammed through my doors and windows and looted my house for everything then shot my sleeping dog fifteen times for “resisting.” they also then proceeded to pee in my mom’s garden and steal my trampoline for “evidence.” smh would not recommend.
